chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going swimming?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽騎兵老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 歡迎收聽口說英語通 我是騎兵老師In this unit, we're going to talk about a present that means a lot to you.這個單元裡面我們要來講的是對你意義重大的禮物那麼首先我們趕快來聽一下這個單元的問題以及我們的回答

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: Question

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: So when I was accepted into one of the most prestigious universities, he was so happy and proud of me.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 題目呢 問的是Talk about a present or a gift someone gave you that you really liked.在英文裡面呢 禮物可以是present也可以是gift 兩個都可以他說呢 談談的是某個人給你一個禮物而且是你很喜歡的禮物回答的時候我們就可以說下What the gift was這個禮物是什麼然後呢 還要說下Who gave it to you

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 誰給你的那麼最後呢Why you like the gift為什麼呢 你喜歡這個禮物現在就進入到我們的回答Among the gifts I have received in my life the most exciting and significant one was the laptop computer my grandfather gave to me這句有點長 我們一段一段來看一開始Among the gifts I have received in my life

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: Among the gifts I have received in my life

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 就是我祖父所給我的筆記型電腦Left up computer就是筆記型電腦或者是手提電腦回答的一開始我們就點出The laptop computer my grandfather gave to me接著下一段My grandfather always had high hopes for me我的祖父呢 一直對我期望很高

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: Have high hopes for這個片語意思就是說對某人有很高的期望When I was little he always said to me當我在很小的時候呢我祖父就對我說You have to make it to college你一定要上大學You have to這邊又用未來又用have to就是將來你一定要make it就是成功的意思to college就是進大學

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 所以這句話是說你將來一定要上大學So when I was accepted into one of the most prestigious universitiesHe was so happy and proud of me他說所以呢When I was accepted into one of the most prestigious universities所以後來當我真的被一所名校所錄取的時候好那這邊was accepted into

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 大學當然指的是被錄取被錄取進入到one of the most prestigious universities就是一所著名的大學Prestigious是一個形容詞就是聲譽茁著的Prestigious universities就是所謂的名校那麼呢我的祖父He was so happy and proud of me他真的很開心而且以我為榮He said然後他就對我說

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: So the computer is a must for every college student祖父說College is the place where you learn and have lots of paper to write大學是一個你要讀書而且有很多報告要寫的地方is the place where那麼這個where是一個關西父辭子句表示是你做什麼的地方

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 那這邊講的就是你要讀書Where you learn and have lots of paper to write好所以呢電腦呢絕對是A must這邊的must當然是一個名詞表示的就是必需品所以A must for every college student每一個大學生的必需品最後面就說了

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 這臺電腦現在已經很舊了但是呢我依然留著它because it's not just a giftand it carries the best wishes from my grandfather他說這不僅僅是一個禮物it carries上面帶著什麼呢the best wishes from my grandfather是我的祖父給我最好的祝福啊

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 第一個句型我們要來練習的是among the名詞the most形容詞is was在什麼之中最什麼的呢就是這個among是一個介系詞表示在什麼之中後面接複數名詞表示是在這麼多的什麼之中呢最什麼的就是後面呢經常介上

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 最高級的句子那我們看一下例句among the large commercial banksthe most profitable is city bank在這麼多的大的商業銀行之中commercial banks就是商業銀行profitable是一個形容詞就是獲益的這邊最賺錢的呢就是城市銀行啦第二個句型make it to就是成功的達到看一下例子

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 烏龜呢必須要自己到達水邊所以叫make it to the water第三個句型is the place where這個where是一個關西父詞子句意思就是做什麼的地方看一下例句home is the place wherewhen you have to go therethey have to take you in這是一個非常有名的美國詩人Robert Frost所說的話

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: 家就是一個地方when you have to go there當你必須回去的時候呢they have to take you in他們必須接納你所以這句話的意思就是家人永遠都會接受你的words and phrases詞彙片語receive動詞收到接手接待significant形容詞有意義的

chunks.chunk_text: laptop computer名詞筆記型電腦high hopes片語期望make it to片語達到accept動詞接受領受 prestigious形容詞有名望的be proud of片語為而驕傲

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Talk about a present or gift someone gave you that you really like
chunks.chunk_text: must名詞必須品best wishes片語最好的祝福以上我們今天討論的就是a present or a giftthat you really like你最喜歡的禮物那麼希望您都學會了ok that's all for this unit每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通我是奇兵老師until then see you next time
